Sentencas: Gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) is an important material to be used as electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cell for intermediate temperature operation.
Titulo: Study of gadolinia-doped ceria solid electrolyte surface by XPS

Sentencas: Ceria doped with 10 mol% gadolinia (Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95) was prepared by conventional solid state synthesis and found to be single phase by room temperature X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Study of gadolinia-doped ceria solid electrolyte surface by XPS

Sentencas: The chemical states of the surface of the prepared sample were analyzed by X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS).
Titulo: Study of gadolinia-doped ceria solid electrolyte surface by XPS

Sentencas: Though Gd was present in its characteristic chemical state, Ce was found in both Ce4+ and Ce3+ states.
Titulo: Study of gadolinia-doped ceria solid electrolyte surface by XPS

Sentencas: Presence of Ce 3, state was ascribed to the differential yield of oxygen atoms in the sputtering process.
Titulo: Study of gadolinia-doped ceria solid electrolyte surface by XPS
